scripts.preview: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages dev
scripts.deploy: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy
scripts.render:dawn: npx remotion render src/remotion/Root.tsx DawnLoop public/videos/dawn-loop.mp4
scripts.render:noon: npx remotion render src/remotion/Root.tsx NoonLoop public/videos/noon-loop.mp4
scripts.render:dusk: npx remotion render src/remotion/Root.tsx DuskLoop public/videos/dusk-loop.mp4
scripts.render:all: npm run render:dawn && npm run render:noon && npm run render:dusk
